attributes.action: Halt the Funding of the Turner Prize
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why are British taxpayers paying for the 'Emperors New Clothes?' It seems to me that the public has never been consulted on the idea of providing a prize to artists who are simply pandering to the chattering classes, when it is more than likely the majority of the people in Britain do not regard this 'exhibition' as art?
